message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm asking for $90 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $70 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. How does that sound?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $75 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $82.50. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still at $75. I'm not willing to go any higher.
